Get ASL sign image (ASL Signbank)

Source: R/get_image_asl.R
get_image_asl.Rd

This function inputs an ASL ID gloss or number and downloads the image of the corresponding sign entry in ASL Signbank.

get_image_asl(
  id,
  glosstext = FALSE,
  gravity = "north",
  location = "+10+20",
  fontsize = 70
)

Arguments

id

ID number for the ASL sign
glosstext

Prints the ID gloss onto the image if set to `TRUE` (default = `FALSE`)
gravity

The anchor point of the text annotation if selected (default = "north")
location

The exact location of the text annotation relative to `gravity`
fontsize

The fontsize for the text annotation (default = 70)

Value

The path of the image file that was downloaded

Details

A few esthetics arguments for the text annotation are optional (e.g. `gravity`, `fontsize`)

Contents
